This bill prohibits brands from flooding the FDA with meritless citizen petitions to block or delay generic competition...

1341585021468106752.text: “Mr. Biden was paid roughly $50,000 a month from 2014 to 2019. For the first three years, then-Vice Pres­i­dent Joe Biden served as the Obama ad­min­is­tra­tion’s point man for in­ternational an­ti­cor­rup­tion ef­forts in Ukraine.”
